verses.verse: A good <S%H8034>name<s%> is <S%H2896>better<s%> than <S%H2896>fine<s%> <S%H8081>perfume;<s%> and the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H4194>death<s%> better than the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H3205>one<s%>'s birth.

It is <S%H2896>better<s%> to <S%H3212>go<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H60>mourning<s%> than to <S%H3212>go<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H4960>feasting:<s%> <S%H834>for<s%> that is the <S%H5490>end<s%> of all <S%H120>men,<s%> and the <S%H2416>living<s%> should <S%H5414>take<s%> this to <S%H3820>heart.<s%>
<S%H3708>Sorrow<s%> is <S%H2896>better<s%> than <S%H7814>laughter;<s%> for by the <S%H7455>sadness<s%> of the <S%H6440>face<s%> the <S%H3820>heart<s%> is made <S%H3190>good.<s%>

The <S%H3820>heart<s%> of the <S%H2450>wise<s%> is in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H60>mourning;<s%> but the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of <S%H3684>fools<s%> is in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H8057>mirth.<s%>
It is <S%H2896>better<s%> to <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H1606>rebuke<s%> of the <S%H2450>wise,<s%> than for a <S%H376>man<s%> to <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H7892>song<s%> of <S%H3684>fools.<s%>
For as the <S%H6963>crackling<s%> of <S%H5518>thorns<s%> under a <S%H5518>pot,<s%> so is the <S%H7814>laughter<s%> of the <S%H3684>fool.<s%> This also is <S%H1892>vanity.<s%>
Surely <S%H6233>extortion<s%> makes the wise <S%H2450>man<s%> <S%H1984>foolish;<s%> and a <S%H4979>bribe<s%> <S%H6>destroys<s%> the <S%H3820>understanding.<s%>

<S%H2896>Better<s%> is the <S%H319>end<s%> of a <S%H1697>thing<s%> than its <S%H7225>beginning.<s%> The <S%H750>patient<s%> in <S%H7307>spirit<s%> is <S%H2896>better<s%> than the <S%H1362>proud<s%> in <S%H7307>spirit.<s%>
<S%H926>Don't<s%> be hasty in your <S%H7307>spirit<s%> to be <S%H3707>angry,<s%> for <S%H3708>anger<s%> <S%H5117>rests<s%> in the <S%H2436>bosom<s%> of <S%H3684>fools.<s%>
<S%H559>Don't<s%> say, "Why were the <S%H7223>former<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H2896>better<s%> than <S%H7592>these?<s%>" For you do not ask wisely about <S%H2451>this.<s%>
<S%H2451>Wisdom<s%> is as <S%H2896>good<s%> as an <S%H5159>inheritance.<s%> <S%H3148>Yes,<s%> it is more excellent for those who <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H8121>sun.<s%>

For <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> is a <S%H6738>defense,<s%> even as <S%H3701>money<s%> is a <S%H6738>defense;<s%> but the <S%H3504>excellency<s%> of <S%H1847>knowledge<s%> is that <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> preserves the <S%H2421>life<s%> of him who has <S%H1167>it.<s%>
<S%H7200>Consider<s%> the <S%H4639>work<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> for who <S%H3201>can<s%> make that <S%H8626>straight,<s%> which he has made <S%H5791>crooked?<s%>

In the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H2896>prosperity<s%> be <S%H2896>joyful,<s%> and in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H7451>adversity<s%> <S%H7200>consider;<s%> <S%H430>yes,<s%> God has <S%H6213>made<s%> the one side by <S%H5980>side<s%> with the <S%H1700>other,<s%> to the end that <S%H120>man<s%> should not <S%H4672>find<s%> out <S%H3972>anything<s%> after <S%H310>him.<s%>

All this have I <S%H7200>seen<s%> in my <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H1892>vanity:<s%> there <S%H3426>is<s%> a <S%H6662>righteous<s%> man who <S%H6>perishes<s%> in his <S%H6664>righteousness,<s%> and there is a <S%H7563>wicked<s%> man who lives <S%H748>long<s%> in his <S%H7451>evildoing.<s%>
<S%H7235>Don't<s%> be overly <S%H6662>righteous,<s%> neither make yourself <S%H3148>overly<s%> <S%H2449>wise.<s%> Why should you destroy <S%H8074>yourself?<s%>
<S%H7235>Don't<s%> be too <S%H7561>wicked,<s%> neither be <S%H5530>foolish.<s%> Why should you <S%H4191>die<s%> before your <S%H6256>time?<s%>

It is <S%H2896>good<s%> that you should take <S%H270>hold<s%> of <S%H2088>this.<s%> <S%H3240>Yes,<s%> also from that don't withdraw your <S%H3027>hand;<s%> for he who <S%H3373>fears<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> will come forth from them <S%H3318>all.<s%>
<S%H2451>Wisdom<s%> is a <S%H5810>strength<s%> to the <S%H2450>wise<s%> man more than <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H7989>rulers<s%> who are in a <S%H5892>city.<s%>
Surely there is not a <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> on <S%H776>earth,<s%> who <S%H6213>does<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%> and <S%H2398>doesn't<s%> sin.
Also <S%H5414>don't<s%> take <S%H3820>heed<s%> to all <S%H1697>words<s%> that are <S%H1696>spoken,<s%> lest you <S%H8085>hear<s%> your <S%H5650>servant<s%> curse <S%H7043>you;<s%>
for <S%H6471>often<s%> your own <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H3045>knows<s%> that you yourself have likewise <S%H7043>cursed<s%> <S%H312>others.<s%>
All <S%H2090>this<s%> have I <S%H5254>proved<s%> in <S%H2451>wisdom.<s%> I <S%H559>said,<s%> "I will be <S%H2449>wise;<s%>" but it was far from <S%H7350>me.<s%>
That which <S%H7350>is,<s%> is far off and exceedingly <S%H6013>deep.<s%> Who can find it <S%H4672>out?<s%>

I <S%H5437>turned<s%> <S%H3820>around,<s%> and my heart sought to <S%H3045>know<s%> and to <S%H8446>search<s%> <S%H1245>out,<s%> and to seek <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> and the <S%H2808>scheme<s%> of <S%H3045>things,<s%> and to know that <S%H7562>wickedness<s%> is <S%H3689>stupidity,<s%> and that <S%H5531>foolishness<s%> is <S%H1947>madness.<s%>

I <S%H4672>find<s%> more <S%H4751>bitter<s%> than <S%H4194>death<s%> the <S%H802>woman<s%> whose <S%H3820>heart<s%> is <S%H4685>snares<s%> and <S%H2764>traps,<s%> whose <S%H3027>hands<s%> are <S%H612>chains.<s%> Whoever <S%H2896>pleases<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H4422>escape<s%> from <S%H2398>her;<s%> but the sinner will be ensnared by <S%H3920>her.<s%>
<S%H7200>"Behold,<s%> I have <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H559>this,<s%>" says the <S%H6953>Preacher,<s%> <S%H259>"one<s%> to <S%H259>another,<s%> to find <S%H4672>out<s%> the <S%H2808>scheme;<s%>

which my <S%H5315>soul<s%> still <S%H1245>seeks;<s%> but I have not <S%H4672>found.<s%> <S%H259>One<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> among a <S%H505>thousand<s%> have I <S%H4672>found;<s%> but I have not <S%H4672>found<s%> a woman among all <S%H802>those.<s%>

<S%H7200>Behold,<s%> this <S%H905>only<s%> have I <S%H4672>found:<s%> that <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H3477>upright;<s%> but they search <S%H1245>for<s%> <S%H120>many<s%> <S%H2810>schemes.<s%>"
